document_data.name: Great Trade Road
document_data.mainbody: The '''Great Trade Road''' was a trail in [[Anauroch]].
document_data.Description: The road headed westThe road turns north, and thus it can't be a path straight south or straight north. Some continued west from the point where it turned north, and thus the road couldn't come from the west; thus, it is assumed to head west. A closer reading may contradict this conclusion. from [[Bitter Well (Anauroch)|Bitter Well Oasis]], and continued for roughly five days, maybe a little less, until it reached a pillar at which the trail turned north, towards the [[Well of the Chasm]].
document_data.History: At some point around {{yearlink|1368}},The default 2{{nd}}-edition date of 1368 DR is assumed. a number of caravans went missing trying to find another way across the mountains. Those turned west instead of north at the pillar.
